name: FactsaboutBarbados
0:
”Alexa fact me bim”
”Alexa fact me about bim”
”Alexa i want to hear a fact abut bim”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fact me bim
des:
Ask for Facts about the island of Barbados.

To start, "Alexa, open Barbados Facts" to get a fact.

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
